Node.Text: My name is Caroline, Caroline Hidges. Pleased to meet you!
I am seventy-two as of last month, and I hope to stay around for much longer!
Is there a special meaning to your name?
Actually, I was named after my own grandmother. She died many years ago.
What brought you to the apartments?
I moved here with my husband many years ago. After he passed, I stayed here to be with our son. Now, I live a quiet life.
Do you see your son often?
Do you enjoy anything in particular about living here?
Oh yes, I love the gardens! They smell so heavenly in the summer. It's such a shame that many of the plants won't survive the winter.
I must be off. Thank you, operator!
